titleStmt.title: Innocency cleared the liberties and priviledges of Gods people for assembling together in his fear to wait upon him very calmly expostulated and their refusal of all oaths in meekness vindicated
titleStmt.author: Mason, Martin, fl. 1650-1676.

titleStmt.title: Innocency cleared the liberties and priviledges of Gods people for assembling together in his fear to wait upon him very calmly expostulated and their refusal of all oaths in meekness vindicated
titleStmt.author: Mason, Martin, fl. 1650-1676.

notesStmt.note: Signed at the end: By a sufferer for truths sake.
Written by Martin Mason. Cf. DNB.
Place and probable date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
